Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 81st overall pick, by Florida in 2002...
Injured on 8/5/2002 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/31/2005 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Florida to San Diego on 2/28/2006 (Going to SDN: LF J. Salazar, 3B A. Marte. Going to FLA: SS L. Rivas)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/9/2006, off Adam Eaton (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/4/2006, off Mark Prior (PIT)...
Injured on 9/13/2008 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/5/2010 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from San Diego to Pittsburgh on 1/31/2012 (Going to PIT: DH G. Jones, LF J. Salazar. Going to SDN: P L. Brito)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/2012, hitting .522 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2012...
Injured on 7/10/2014 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/27/2015 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/22/2015 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by San Francisco in 2017...
Traded from San Francisco to Minnesota on 4/24/2017 (Going to SFN: 1B J. Singleton, C C. Sisco. Going to MIN: 1B W. Divers, 2B T. Anderson)...
Had first career hit on 4/25/2018, off Chad Bettis (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/2018, off Aaron Sanchez (NYM)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/2020, hitting .500 with 6 HR, 13 RBI...
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1977...
Injured on 7/17/1979 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 4/16/1980 with a Broken Finger, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1981, off Rich Hand (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1981, off Al Holland (LA)...
Injured on 5/2/1981 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1984...
Injured on 6/18/1985 with a Broken Jaw, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1986 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Francisco on 10/10/1986...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 1986...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against St. Louis on 7/7/1987...
Injured on 7/23/1988 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
